name: MADFLIGHT
description:
MADFLIGHT IS AN EXTREME FAST PACED ACTION GAME WHERE YOU

  • SHOOT EVERYTHING
  • AVOID EVERYTHING
  • EARN POINTS
  • GATHER UPGRADES AND EAT HOT DOGS

================================================================

USE YOUR MOUSE TO MOVE

LMB TO SHOOT

RMB TO USE YOUR SHIELD

R TO RESTART

ESC TO EXIT THE GAME

EARN 300000 POINTS TO WIN THE GAME

Sounds fun? IT IS
